message: Dose values extracted from EX domain.
2 subjects in DM have ARMCD not defined in TA. These subjects are excluded from group statistics.
ARM label mismatch for ARMCD "2": DM says "Low Dose", TA says "2 mg/kg PCDRUG".
TS domain is missing SPECIES, STRAIN, and ROUTE. Study metadata is incomplete.
DOSE=0 group labeled "Sham Group" (ambiguous control). Using as comparator with caution.
